alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 04 at 11:23AM EST until January 04 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 13 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES TIFT THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ASHTON, ATHENA, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BAY CITY, BERRIEN CO A/P, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOWENS MILL, BOYD, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCK SIDING, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAPPS, CARBUR, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHERRY LAKE, CHULA, COOK CO A/P, COOKS HAMMOCK, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, DAY, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, EMPRESS, FESTUS, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, FORT GADSDEN, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HARDING, HILLIARDVILLE, HOPEWELL, IRWINVILLE, JARROTT, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LOVETT, MADISON, MASSEE, MAYO, MIDWAY, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, OCILLA, PERRY, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, SOPCHOPPY, SPENCE AIRPORT, ST. MARKS, SUNSWEET, TEETERVILLE, TIFTON, TILTON, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WATERLOO, WEBER, AND WESTWOOD.
